column4: if you have the full samba package installed, you should have a command called smbmount, i believe
if you're missing samba.... sudo apt-get install samba.  then you should have everything you need to mount that share :)
& neil__: I got smbmout. i will try get it working. thanks for your help :-)
no troubles, i apologize for being so foggy headed and still trying to help people lol
